record.text:
I can't believe that 16 years into #PowerShell and I still learn new useful things every day:

Formats/Types can be loaded in a PowerShell module by wildcard:

FormatsToProcess='*.format.ps1xml'
TypesToProcess='*.types.ps1xml'

Works!

Can't wait to integrate into github.com/StartAutomat...
